1.content:
Congratulations, you are a detective. Badge, Hat, Magnifying glass, everything.

The hollywood police department has assigned you as protection for the famous movie fur Roger Rabbit

However, as a teen growing up, you've always had a loving for tickling. So this could be your next shot at a fun victim

Cruising around in the old roaring Cadillac, your first task is to find the character. The police department sergant had informed you of several places Roger loved visiting.

Where should you drive to?
1.title: The Beginning

info.brief_description: This is a furry tickling montage with Roger Rabbit
info.description:
Very surprised no one has done this yet

This is a furry tickling montage with Roger Rabbit as your victim or your tickler.
As long as it is tickling related, do whatever action you wish to him.

Anything goes for story arcs, but do not kill off Roger. Otherwise have fun ;)
